tweet.text: At @ColumbiaSIPA, Albright earned a master’s degree with her thesis on the Soviet diplomatic corps and a PhD with her dissertation on the role of the Czechoslovakian press during the 1968 Prague Spring. https://t.co/AgliOWIJAr https://t.co/MHfFxyEPL5
